pages.text: Modifiers affecting the player's items on death$(br)$(li)$(l)Afterlife$()$(li2)All items you entered with will be restored on death $(li2)Artifacts can be found $(li2)Experience multiplier x0.5$(li)$(l)Phoenix$() $(li2)All items you entered with will be restored on death

$(li)$(l)Beginners Grace$() $(li2)Automatically applies to Vault level 0-10 $(li2)All items you entered with will be restored on death $(li2)No experience on death$(br2)$(l)Note$() that if you modify a level 10 or below crystal by either adding a seal or catalyst, Beginners Grace will not be applied
